Description: As a Legend, get 150 credits per month to use on Fable! Comes with access to 5 audiobooks per month from our wide selection, as well as a delivery of the book of the month! With access to ARC's, teasers for new releases and more, join today to enhance your experience on Fable!
Tale Crafters get access to 100 credits every month to use on Fable, as well as access to 2 audiobooks from Fables massive selection! Join today for more!
Poets get access to 45 credits every month to use on Fable, as well as a delivery of the book of the month! Join today to enhance your experience here on Fable!
